sentences.sContent: They practice what is known as fraternal polyandry -- where the brothers of one family marry the same woman.
sentences.sContent_eng: They practice what is known as fraternal polyandry -- where the brothers of one family marry the same woman.
sentences.sCn: 他们是事实上所谓的兄弟一妻多夫制（fraternal polyandry ）---一家的兄弟娶同一个老婆。

words.tran: 多夫妇女；赞成一妻多夫制的妇女

trans.tranOther: the practice or condition of being married to more than one husband at the same time
